title: Anatomy and Radiology Skills Enhancement Blended Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in basic medicine and anatomy
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented education utilizing digital devices, focusing on improving skills in interpreting radiological images and applying them clinically.

learning_goals: Learners can identify normal and lesion areas in X-ray images with 90% accuracy.
Students can write a project report analyzing clinical cases using radiological anatomy knowledge.
Students can establish and execute self-directed learning plans through digital learning tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
